Public MustInherit Class MethodDispatcherBaseWithSerializer Inherits MethodDispatcherBase

Docs.summary: The class dispatches the requests from the client to the interface/method of the remoted objectts. This class is used by remoting code generator. This class caches the Serializer.

Docs.param: The returned value from the method.
Docs.summary: This method is implemented by the generated method dispatcher to create the response from the specified return value as a result of dispatching the method to the remoted object.
Docs.returns: A Object that represents the response body to be sent back to the client.

Docs.param: The object impplemented the remoted interface.
Id of the method to which to dispatch the request to.
The body of the request object that needs to be dispatched to the object.
The cancellation token that will be signaled if this operation is cancelled.
Docs.summary: This method is used to dispatch request to the specified methodId of the interface implemented by the remoted object.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the outstanding asynchronous call to the implementation object. The return value of the task contains the returned value from the invoked method.
